name: Island Broth
description:
It's a perfectly fine day in the Archipelago. Only one thing could make it better: cooking a delicious stew! 🍲

Explore a series of randomly generated islands, fight some robots and find the ingredients for your mushroom stew. 🍄

The world is different every time you play, so it's recommended to play with pen and paper to draw your own map! 🧭

Controls:

KeyboardControllerUse held itemZBInteractXASwitch itemsCY

This game was made for the Sokpop Community Jam and it's inspired by Kraken's Curse.

The main menu music is by Louie Zong. Go check out his albums!

And don't forget to follow me on Twitter to see more projects! :)
